infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to record videos of your child for developmental assessment.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to capture audio during video recording.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to select videos for developmental assessment.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow DevAssess to access your camera for recording developmental videos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow DevAssess to access your microphone for recording audio.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow DevAssess to access your photos to select videos for assessment.
